WorkItem.Description:
When you switch from the beta DK2 tracker to the mouse tracker VR Player for windows will crash throwing the below exception.

Application: VrPlayer.exe
Framework Version: v4.0.30319
Description: The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception.
Exception Info: System.NullReferenceException
Stack:
   at VrPlayer.Trackers.OculusRiftDK2Tracker.OculusRiftDK2Tracker.Unload()
